sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' class ListBookShelfs extends Component{ static propTypes = { currently_reading: PropTypes.array.isRequired, want_to_read: PropTypes.array.isRequired, read: PropTypes.array.isRequired } render (){ const { currently_reading, want_to_read,read } = this.props let showing_currently_reading, showing_want_to_read,showing_read return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card

Want to Read

  1. 1776
    David McCullough
  2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
    J.K. Rowling

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
) } } export default ListBookShelfs
